title: Temporary outdoor dining and parklet permits
dataVerified: Restaurant name, location, seating area, barriers, ADA compliance, health dept
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (issued/expired). Link to planning/public works system (enforcement and public, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents unpermitted parklets. Domain binding verifies planning/public works. ADA compliance verification. Health permit verification. Prevents sidewalk obstruction violations.
